tool_description: Analyzes customer's historical interactions, reviews, and purchase patterns to provide context for personalizing automated responses and understanding customer relationship dynamics.

include_purchase_history.description: Whether to include purchase history analysis

include_review_history.description: Whether to include previous review history

include_support_interactions.description: Whether to include customer support interaction history

analysis_period_days.description: Number of days of history to analyze (1-365)

error_messages: Invalid customer ID: Provide a valid customer_id parameter.
Customer not found: The specified customer_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid analysis period: analysis_period_days must be between 1 and 365.
Insufficient data: Customer has insufficient historical data for meaningful analysis.
usage: Provide customer_id parameter to analyze customer history. Use boolean parameters to control which types of historical data to include. Set analysis_period_days to limit the scope of historical analysis.

customer_tier.description: Customer classification: vip, premium, standard, new

total_purchases.description: Total number of purchases in analysis period

average_rating_given.description: Average rating customer gives in reviews (1-5 scale)

previous_complaints.description: Number of previous complaints or negative reviews

response_engagement_rate.description: Rate at which customer engages with business responses (0-1 scale)

loyalty_indicators.description: Indicators of customer loyalty or satisfaction patterns
